riverguides.name: Gunner
riverguides.bio: Gunner, or as we like to call him - Old Man River, has been running the river for two decades. He was born to guide.

riverguides.name: Jack
riverguides.bio: Jack is a champion kayaker and loves to take the road less traveled.

riverguides.name: Andromeda
riverguides.bio: Andromeda goes with the flow, literally. She's a great guide to have on your journey, especially if you want to hear the History of the Salmon River
